fields.desc: You pay for the best and might have a staff that supports your lifestyle. Others notice your wealth and might encourage you to share it, either legally or otherwise.
fields.name: Lifestyle - Aristocratic

fields.desc: You spend modestly for your necessities and enjoy a few luxuries.
fields.name: Lifestyle - Comfortable

fields.desc: You support yourself at an average level.
fields.name: Lifestyle - Modest

fields.desc: You spend frugally for your necessities.
fields.name: Lifestyle - Poor

fields.desc: You spend the bare minimum for your necessities. You might be exposed to unhealthy conditions and opportunistic criminals.
fields.name: Lifestyle - Squalid

fields.desc: You're accustomed to the finer things in life and might have servants.
fields.name: Lifestyle - Wealthy

fields.desc: You survive via chance and charity. You're often exposed to natural dangers as a result of sleeping outside.
fields.name: Lifestyle - Wretched

fields.desc: Exquisite lodging in the finest conditions.

fields.desc: Good lodging in above-average conditions.
fields.name: Lodging - Comfortable

fields.desc: Decent lodging in average conditions.
fields.name: Lodging - Modest

fields.desc: Simple lodging in modest conditions.
fields.name: Lodging - Poor

fields.desc: Basic lodging in poor conditions.
fields.name: Lodging - Squalid

fields.desc: Fine lodging in high-quality conditions.
fields.name: Lodging - Wealthy

fields.desc: An exquisite meal of the highest quality.
fields.name: Meal (Aristocratic)

fields.desc: A good meal of above-average quality.
fields.name: Meal (Comfortable)

fields.desc: A decent meal of average quality.
fields.name: Meal (Modest)

fields.desc: A simple meal of low quality.
fields.name: Meal (Poor)

fields.desc: A basic meal of poor quality.
fields.name: Meal (Squalid)

fields.desc: A fine meal of high quality.
fields.name: Meal (Wealthy)

fields.desc: A messenger who will deliver a message to a destination.
fields.name: Messenger

fields.desc: A skilled hireling who can perform tasks requiring proficiency (weapons, tools, or skills).
fields.name: Skilled Hireling

fields.name: Spellcasting (Cantrip)
